global_attributes.title: Gliders in the Gulf of Mexico
global_attributes.acknowledgement: This project was funded by BP and National Science Foundation
global_attributes.project: Gliders in the Gulf of Mexico
global_attributes.summary: The overarching goal of Spray underwater glider operations in the Gulf of Mexico was to improve dynamical knowledge of oceanographic conditions in the Loop Current and associated eddies.  A specific objective was to provide data to data assimilating models to establish the predictability of currents in the region.
